allSaves.value: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

details.flavorText: An osyluth is an unparalleled inquisitor that revels in the sadism and torture for which Hell is so well known. These devils' charge is to seek out heresies, both among mortals and among other fiends—a commandment they uphold with unwavering fervor. They spawn within the Styx-fed swamps of Hell's fifth layer, Stygia; where heresies and the souls of heretics stagnate, osyluths eventually rise. In the remote corners of that same layer of Hell, they build massive, calcified hives where they perform their vile interrogations and perfect their torturous arts upon lesser devils and petitioners alike.

description.value:
Opening a door that bypasses normal space, you instantly transport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to a clear space within range you can see. If this would bring another creature with you—even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container—the spell is lost.

Heightened The range increases to 1 mile. You don't need to be able to see your destination, as long as you have been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from you. You are temporarily immune for 1 hour.
description.label: Description

description.value:
Illusory pain wracks the target, dealing 2d4 mental damage and 1d4 persistent mental damage. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes full initial damage but no @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Damage}, and the spell ends immediately.

Failure The target takes full initial and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Damage}, and the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} 1. If the target recovers from being @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened}, the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Damage} ends and the spell ends.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} 2.

Heightened The damage increases by 2d4 and the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Damage} by 1d4.
description.label: Description

description.value:
Opening a door that bypasses normal space, you instantly transport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to a clear space within range you can see. If this would bring another creature with you—even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container—the spell is lost.

Heightened The range increases to 1 mile. You don't need to be able to see your destination, as long as you have been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from you. You are temporarily immune for 1 hour.
description.label: Description

description.value:
You interfere with the target's ability to teleport and travel between dimensions. Dimensional anchor attempts to counteract any teleportation effect, or any effect that would move the target to a different plane. The duration is determined by the target's Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The effect's duration is 1 minute.

Failure The effect's duration is 10 minutes.

Critical Failure The effect's duration is 1 hour.
description.label: Description

description.value:
You interfere with the target's ability to teleport and travel between dimensions. Dimensional anchor attempts to counteract any teleportation effect, or any effect that would move the target to a different plane. The duration is determined by the target's Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The effect's duration is 1 minute.

Failure The effect's duration is 10 minutes.

Critical Failure The effect's duration is 1 hour.
description.label: Description

description.value: Falsehoods ring in your ears like discordant notes. You gain a +4 status bonus to Perception checks when someone Lies.
description.label: Description

description.value:
You designate an area in which creatures are compelled to speak only truth. Creatures within or entering the area have difficulty lying. Each potentially affected creature must attempt a Will save when the spell is cast or when the creature first enters the area. It uses the results of this initial save if it leaves and reenters the area. Affected creatures are aware of this enchantment; therefore, they can avoid answering questions to which they would normally respond with a lie, or they can be evasive as long as they remain within the boundaries of the truth.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes a –2 status penalty to Deception checks.

Failure The target can't speak any deliberate and intentional lies, and it takes a –2 status penalty to Deception checks.

Critical Failure The target can't speak any deliberate and intentional lies and takes a –4 status penalty to Deception checks.
description.label: Description

description.value:
Cloaked in illusion, the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. This makes it @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to them instead. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends after that hostile action is completed.

Heightened The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.
description.label: Description

description.value:
You make an appeal to a powerful devil, asking it to bind some of its subordinates to your service. If you succeed, the devil sends you its choice of one devil whose level is no more than double infernal pact’s level, two devils whose levels are each at least 2 less than double the spell level, or three devils whose levels are each at least 3 less than double the spell level.

Critical Success The devils are sent to you and serve you for 1d4 weeks.
Success The devils are sent to you and serve you for 1d4 days.
Failure Your request is denied.
Critical Failure Not only is your request denied, but the powerful devil sends word of its displeasure to your master.

Saving Throw DC 25 Fortitude; Maximum Duration 6 rounds; Stage 1 [[/r 2d6 # poison damage]] poison damage, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.Enfeebled] 1 (1 round); Stage 2 [[/r 3d6 # poison damage]] poison damage and enfeebled 1 (1 round); Stage 3 [[/r 3d6 # poison damage]] poison damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round). Once a creature reaches stage 3, it takes a –4 status penalty to Will saves against attempts to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{Coerce} it for 1 hour (this is a mental effect).
The osyluth can cast innate @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility} using only 1 action.

An osyluth deals an extra [[/r 2d6 # damage]] damage whenever they Strike an @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.Enfeebled], @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.Frightened], or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.Prone] creature.
The osyluth telepathically questions a creature affected by zone of truth. After 1 round, if the creature intentionally refuses to answer the question, it takes 2d6 mental damage.
The osyluth sweeps their tail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the cone must succeed at a DC 26 Reflex save or be knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.Prone].
